subject: Football
Colleges and Universities
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: Three linemen on the North Carolina football team are the alleged victims of kidnapping and sexual molestation in a case that has drawn uncomfortable reminders of the Duke lacrosse scandal.
snippet: Three linemen on the North Carolina football team are the alleged victims of kidnapping and sexual molestation in a case that has drawn uncomfortable reminders of the Duke lacrosse scandal.
